predicate.note: Frames file for 'wince' based on sentences in brown.

roleset.name: To shrink or start involuntarily, as in pain or distress

example.name: often with 'in' phrase
example.text: ``In dull domestic radiance I watch [her staring face]-1, still blind, / Start [*-1] wincing in obedience / To dirty waters, counters, pots and pans, / Waiting below stairs, in her mind''.
example.arg: in obedience / To dirty waters, counters, pots and pans, / Waiting below stairs, in her mind
